statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures;
SELECT facility_name, temperature_threshold FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE temperature_threshold > 20;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE waste_type = 'compostable';
SELECT id, facility_name, quality_control_passed FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE quality_control_passed = true;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE facility_name = 'Green Earth Facility' AND quality_control_passed = true ORDER BY temperature_threshold DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, quality_control_passed FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE waste_type = 'compostable' ORDER BY humidity_threshold ASC
SELECT id, facility_name FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE temperature_threshold > 25 AND waste_type = 'plant-based'
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE temperature_threshold < 20 AND humidity_threshold > 60
SELECT facility_name, temperature_threshold, humidity_threshold FROM biodegradable_waste_quality_control_measures WHERE quality_control_passed = false
SELECT * FROM biowaste_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM biowaste_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, operating_capacity FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE operating_capacity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures ORDER BY last_audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE status='Active';
SELECT facility_name, operating_capacity FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Incinerator%';
SELECT * FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE location='Chicago' ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, operating_capacity FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE operating_capacity > 500 ORDER BY operating_capacity ASC;
SELECT facility_name, status FROM biowaste_facilities WHERE facility_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures;
SELECT measure_name, measure_type FROM QualityControlMeasures ORDER BY measure_name ASC;
SELECT measure_description FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE measure_type = 'Safety';
SELECT * FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE facility_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE measure_type = 'Testing';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE facility_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE measure_type = 'Inspection' ORDER BY measure_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, facility_type FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE location LIKE '%City' AND facility_type IS NULL;
SELECT qcm.measure_name, qcl.log_date, qcl.passed FROM QualityControlMeasures qcm INNER JOIN QualityControlLogs qcl ON qcm.id = qcl.measure_id ORDER BY qcl.log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures
SELECT facility_name, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE inspection_date = '2022-03-15'
SELECT facility_name, inspection_result FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT facility_name, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Waste%'
SELECT * FROM Inspectors
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT facility_name, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM QualityControlMeasures ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, inspection_result, inspector_name FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE inspector_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE facility_name = 'Facility1' AND inspection_result = 'Fail';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Records FROM QualityControlMeasures;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures;
SELECT measure_name, description FROM QualityControlMeasures;
SELECT * FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, role FROM Employees WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT measure_name, description FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE measure_name = 'Measure 1';
SELECT * FROM WasteProcessingFacilities WHERE location = 'City A' ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, weight FROM BiodegradableWaste WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT e.name, e.role, f.facility_name FROM Employees e JOIN WasteProcessingFacilities f ON e.facility_id = f.id WHERE e.role = 'Manager';
